metadata.title: Real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction assays for Middle East Respiratory Syndrome

abstract.original_text: Here we designed and tested two highly specific quantitative TaqMan ® -MGB-based reverse transcriptase quantitative polymerase chain reaction (RT-qPCR) assays for Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS). The primers and probes for these assays were evaluated and found to have a limit of detection (LOD) of 0.005 plaque-forming units/PCR (pfu/PCR).

sentences.segment_text: Here we designed and tested two highly specific quantitative TaqMan ® - MGB-based reverse transcriptase quantitative polymerase chain reaction ( RT-qPCR ) assays for Middle East Respiratory Syndrome ( MERS ) .
The primers and probes for these assays were evaluated and found to have a limit of detection ( LOD ) of 0.005 plaque-forming units/PCR ( pfu/PCR ) .
